overclocks.name: Composite Casings
overclocks.description: Lighter rounds that permit a shorter delay between bursts, and you can carry a few more of them as well. What's not to like?

overclocks.name: Full Chamber Seal
overclocks.description: Meticulous sealing lets you get a bit more power out of each round, and the attention to detail improves how easily the magazine slots in.

overclocks.name: Compact Mags
overclocks.description: You can carry even more ammo, but the rate of fire needs to be toned back to avoid a jam, and please take more care while reloading.

overclocks.name: Experimental Rounds
overclocks.description: A new shape to the bullet delivers a lot more damage, but its odd size means fewer rounds in the clip and a bit less ammo overall.

overclocks.name: Electro Minelets
overclocks.description: After impacting terrain, these high-tech bullets convert in to electro-minelets that will electrocute anything unfortunate enough to come close. However, they don't last forever, and the rounds themselves take more space in the clip and deal less direct damage.

overclocks.name: Micro Flechettes
overclocks.description: Convert the BRT to fire small flechettes instead of slugs. Increases overall ammo and magazine size as well as reducing recoil, but at the cost of raw damage.

overclocks.name: Lead Spray
overclocks.description: It ain't pretty, but this overclock will tear apart anything that gets close, though it gets a bit iffy at range
